comment: /**  * Bind the given property.  * @param propertyName the property name (in lowercase dashed form, e.g.  * {@code first-name})  * @param target the target bindable  * @return the bound value or {@code null}  */
code: /**  * Bind the given property.  * @param propertyName the property name (in lowercase dashed form, e.g.  * {@code first-name})  * @param target the target bindable  * @return the bound value or {@code null}  */ Object bindProperty(String propertyName, Bindable<?> target).
